00025 #include "syx-object.h"
00026 
00027 #include "syx-types.h"
00028 #include "syx-enums.h"
00029 #include "syx-scheduler.h"
00030 #include "syx-utils.h"
00031 #include "syx-error.h"
00032 #include "syx-interp.h"
00033 #include "syx-memory.h"
00034 #include "syx-init.h"
00035 #include "syx-profile.h"
00036 
00037 #ifdef SYX_DEBUG_FULL
00038 #define SYX_DEBUG_PROCESS_SWITCH
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 SyxOop syx_processor;
00042 SyxOop *_syx_processor_active_process;
00043 SyxOop *_syx_processor_byteslice;
00044 
00045 SyxSchedulerPoll *_syx_scheduler_poll_sources = NULL;
00046 
00047 /* These are implemented in scheduler-posix or scheduler-win */
00048 void _syx_scheduler_init_platform (void);
00049 void _syx_scheduler_poll_wait_platform (void);
00050 void _syx_scheduler_quit_platform (void);
00051 
00052 static void
00053 _syx_scheduler_poll_wait (void)
00054 {
00055   SyxSchedulerPoll *source = _syx_scheduler_poll_sources;
00056   for (source=_syx_scheduler_poll_sources; source;)
00057     {
00058       SyxSchedulerSourceFunc func = (SyxSchedulerSourceFunc)source->fd;
00059       /* Take next source here for possible re-entrancy troubles */
00060       source=source->next;
00061       if (func ())
00062         syx_semaphore_signal (source->semaphore);
00063     }
00064 
00065   _syx_scheduler_poll_wait_platform ();
00066 }
00067 
00068 static SyxOop 
00069 _syx_scheduler_find_next_process ()
00070 {
00071   SyxOop process;
00072 
00073   /* No processes have been scheduled */
00074   if (SYX_IS_NIL (syx_processor_active_process))
00075     return syx_nil;
00076 
00077   for (process=SYX_PROCESS_NEXT (syx_processor_active_process); ; process = SYX_PROCESS_NEXT (process))
00078     {
00079       /* This loop won't break until a resumed process is found, so we call the poll from here */
00080       _syx_scheduler_poll_wait ();
00081 
00082       /* An external source could have nullified the activeProcess in the meanwhile */
00083       if (SYX_IS_NIL (syx_processor_active_process))
00084         return syx_nil;
00085 
00086       if (SYX_IS_FALSE (SYX_PROCESS_SUSPENDED (process)))
00087         return process;
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00096 void
00097 syx_scheduler_init (void)
00098 {
00099   syx_processor = syx_globals_at_if_absent ("Processor", syx_nil);
00100   if (SYX_IS_NIL (syx_processor))
00101     {
00102       syx_processor = syx_object_new (syx_processor_scheduler_class);
00103       SYX_PROCESSOR_SCHEDULER_BYTESLICE(syx_processor) = syx_small_integer_new (100);
00104       syx_globals_at_put (syx_symbol_new ("Processor"), syx_processor);
00105 
00106       _syx_scheduler_init_platform ();
00107     }
00108 
00109   _syx_processor_active_process = &SYX_PROCESSOR_SCHEDULER_ACTIVE_PROCESS(syx_processor);
00110   _syx_processor_byteslice = &SYX_PROCESSOR_SCHEDULER_BYTESLICE(syx_processor);
00111 }
00112 
00117 syx_bool
00118 syx_scheduler_iterate (void)
00119 {
00120   SyxOop proc;
00121   proc = _syx_scheduler_find_next_process ();
00122   if (SYX_IS_NIL (proc))
00123     return FALSE;
00124 
00125   syx_processor_active_process = proc;
00126   syx_process_execute_scheduled (proc);
00127   return TRUE;
00128 }
00129 
00131 void
00132 syx_scheduler_run (void)
00133 {
00134   static syx_bool running = FALSE;
00135 
00136   SYX_START_PROFILE;
00137 
00138   if (running)
00139     return;
00140 
00141 
00142   running = TRUE;
00143 
00144   while (!SYX_IS_NIL (syx_processor_active_process = _syx_scheduler_find_next_process ()))
00145     {  
00146 #ifdef SYX_DEBUG_PROCESS_SWITCH
00147       syx_debug ("SCHEDULER - Switch process with %p\n", SYX_OBJECT(syx_processor_active_process));
00148 #endif
00149 
00150       syx_process_execute_scheduled (syx_processor_active_process);
00151     }
00152 
00153   running = FALSE;
00154 
00155   SYX_END_PROFILE(scheduler);
00156 }
00157 
00165 void
00166 syx_scheduler_poll_register_source (SyxSchedulerSourceFunc callback, SyxOop semaphore)
00167 {
00168   SyxSchedulerPoll *s = (SyxSchedulerPoll *) syx_malloc (sizeof (SyxSchedulerPoll));
00169   s->fd = (syx_nint) callback;
00170   s->semaphore = semaphore;
00171   s->next = _syx_scheduler_poll_sources;
00172   _syx_scheduler_poll_sources = s;
00173 }
00174 
00178 void
00179 syx_scheduler_poll_unregister_source (SyxSchedulerSourceFunc callback, SyxOop semaphore)
00180 {
00181   SyxSchedulerPoll *s, *pre;
00182 
00183   for (s=_syx_scheduler_poll_sources, pre=NULL; s;)
00184     {
00185       if (s->fd == (syx_nint)callback && s->semaphore == semaphore)
00186         {
00187           if (!pre)
00188             _syx_scheduler_poll_sources = s->next;
00189           else
00190             pre->next = s->next;
00191           /* Take next source here for possible re-entrancy troubles */
00192           s=s->next;
00193           syx_free (s);
00194         }
00195     }
00196 }
00197 
00199 void
00200 syx_scheduler_quit (void)
00201 {
00202   _syx_scheduler_quit_platform ();
00203 }
00204 
00208 syx_bool
00209 syx_scheduler_add_process (SyxOop process)
00210 {
00211   if (SYX_IS_TRUE (SYX_PROCESS_SCHEDULED (process)))
00212     return FALSE;
00213 
00214   if (SYX_IS_NIL (syx_processor_active_process))
00215     SYX_PROCESS_NEXT(process) = syx_processor_active_process = process;
00216   else
00217     {
00218       SYX_PROCESS_NEXT(process) = SYX_PROCESS_NEXT(syx_processor_active_process);
00219       SYX_PROCESS_NEXT(syx_processor_active_process) = process;
00220     }
00221   SYX_PROCESS_SCHEDULED(process) = syx_true;
00222   return TRUE;
00223 }
00224 
00228 syx_bool
00229 syx_scheduler_remove_process (SyxOop process)
00230 {
00231   SyxOop cur_process, prev_process;
00232 
00233   if (SYX_IS_NIL (syx_processor_active_process))
00234     return FALSE;
00235 
00236   if (SYX_OOP_EQ (process, syx_processor_active_process) && SYX_OOP_EQ (SYX_PROCESS_NEXT (process), process))
00237     {
00238       /* The active process was the only being scheduled */
00239       SYX_PROCESS_SCHEDULED(process) = syx_false;
00240       syx_processor_active_process = syx_nil;
00241       return TRUE;
00242     }
00243   else
00244     {
00245       prev_process = syx_processor_active_process;
00246       cur_process = SYX_PROCESS_NEXT (prev_process);
00247       do
00248         {
00249           if (SYX_OOP_EQ (cur_process, process))
00250             {
00251               SYX_PROCESS_NEXT(prev_process) = SYX_PROCESS_NEXT (process);
00252               SYX_PROCESS_SCHEDULED(process) = syx_false;
00253               /* We can't remove the activeProcess without replacing it with another one.
00254                  We chose the previous so that the next one is executed. */
00255               if (SYX_OOP_EQ (process, syx_processor_active_process))
00256                 syx_processor_active_process = prev_process;
00257               return TRUE;
00258             }
00259           prev_process=cur_process;
00260           cur_process = SYX_PROCESS_NEXT(prev_process);
00261         } while (SYX_OOP_NE (cur_process, SYX_PROCESS_NEXT (syx_processor_active_process)));
00262     }
00263 
00264   return FALSE;
00265 }
